::Cyberkeet::

Cyberkeet: Now that proves itself to be a worthwhile investment, what an 
accomplishment; to turn a planet into a wasteland."

::Flagist::

Flagist looks like a hurt child for a second and then apparently he forgot 
the whole thing and starts dancing like a whirling ballerina while upon 
hearing the word wasteland starts singing.

Flagist: Oh Green Acres is the place for me, dessert as far as the eye can 
see!"

He is not even singing the right words
